doc:
Helen Ford https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helen_Ford 0 Helen Ford (June 6, 1894, Troy, New York–January 19, 1982, Glendale, California) was an American actress. Born Helen Isabel Barnett, she was an important stage actress in musicals in the 1920s. A "Rodgers, Hart, and Fields' favorite", she starred in three of their Broadway productions: Dearest Enemy (1925), Peggy-Ann (1926) and Chee-Chee (1928).She went on to appear in films and television programmes, including The Raid. Helen_Ford ( June_6_,_1894 , Troy , New_York – January_19_,_1982 , Glendale , California ) was an_American_actress . Born Helen_Isabel_Barnett , she was an_important_stage_actress in musicals in the_1920s . A_"_Rodgers_,_Hart_, and Fields '_favorite_" , she starred in three of their_Broadway_productions : Dearest_Enemy_(_1925_) , Peggy-Ann_(_1926_) and Chee-Chee_(_1928_) . She went on to_appear in films_and_television_programmes , including The_Raid .
